Numbered list items render as flat paragraphs
.
1. Item 1
2. Item 2
2. Item 3
.
<p class="list-item">1. Item 1</p>
<p class="list-item">2. Item 2</p>
<p class="list-item">2. Item 3</p>
.

Bulleted list items render as flat paragraphs
.
- Item 1
- Item 2
.
<p class="list-item">- Item 1</p>
<p class="list-item">- Item 2</p>
.

Nested list items render with a depth indicator
.
- Item 1
- Item 2
    - Item 2a
.
<p class="list-item">- Item 1</p>
<p class="list-item">- Item 2</p>
<p class="list-item indent-2">- Item 2a</p>
.

Expanded numbered list items render as flat paragraphs
.
1. Item 1

2. Item 2

2. Item 3
.
<p class="list-item">1. Item 1</p>
<p class="list-item">2. Item 2</p>
<p class="list-item">2. Item 3</p>
.

Expanded bulleted list items render as flat paragraphs
.
- Item 1

- Item 2
.
<p class="list-item">- Item 1</p>
<p class="list-item">- Item 2</p>
.

Expanded nested list items render with a depth indicator
.
- Item 1

- Item 2

    - Item 2a
.
<p class="list-item">- Item 1</p>
<p class="list-item">- Item 2</p>
<p class="list-item indent-2">- Item 2a</p>
.

HANGING INDENTATION
.
 -  This is a list paragraph
    with hanging indentation;
    it should be rendered as
    a single paragraph.
.
<p class="list-item">- This is a list paragraph
with hanging indentation;
it should be rendered as
a single paragraph.</p>
.

BLANK LINES
.
-   
  foo
.
<p class="list-item">- foo</p>
.

.
-

  foo
.
<p class="list-item">-</p>
<p>foo</p>
.

.

-
- bar
.
<p class="list-item">- foo</p>
<p class="list-item">-</p>
<p class="list-item">- bar</p>
.

.
- foo
-   
- bar
.
<p class="list-item">- foo</p>
<p class="list-item">-</p>
<p class="list-item">- bar</p>
.

.
1. foo
2.
3. bar
.
<p class="list-item">1. foo</p>
<p class="list-item">2.</p>
<p class="list-item">3. bar</p>
.

.
*
.
<p class="list-item">*</p>
.

SEPARATION FROM PREVIOUS PARAGRAPHS
.
Foo
- bar
- baz
.
This is wrong, no?
<p>Foo</p>
<p class="list-item">- bar</p>
<p class="list-item">- baz</p>
.

.
The number of windows in my house is
1.  The number of doors is 6.
.
This is wrong.
<p>The number of windows in my house is</p>
<p class="list-item">1. The number of doors is 6.</p>
.

WITH HEADINGS
What to do about headings in list items?
.
- # Foo
- Bar
  ---
  baz
.
This is wrong. Not sure what to do about this.
<h1>Foo</h1>
<h2>Bar</h2>
baz
.

LAZY NESTED STRUCTURES
.
> 1. > Blockquote
continued here.
.
This is wrong, as the number must be printed.
<blockquote>
<blockquote>
<p>Blockquote
continued here.</p>
</blockquote>
</blockquote>
.

.
> 1. > Blockquote
> continued here.
.
This is wrong, as the number must be printed.
<blockquote>
<blockquote>
<p>Blockquote
continued here.</p>
</blockquote>
</blockquote>
.

.
- - foo
.
This must be wrong.
<p class="list-item indent-2">- foo</p>
.

.
1. - 2. foo
.
This is wrong.
<p class="list-item indent-3">1. foo</p>
.
